project_descr: Expanding the PA System to incorporate Important Aquatic Ecosystems

outputs.output_descr: The full size project document will address the necessity of creating an aquatic protected area systems in Bangladesh. There has been recent changes in the GoB policy regime in terms of declaring new protected areas and the project will address biodiversity conservation in important aqutic protected areas in the Sundrabans declared by the GoB.

project_title: expanding the pa system to incorporate important aquatic
